name: Flashcard Study Tool
backend_requirements: 1. Flashcard model: id, question (required), answer (required), category, difficulty
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/flashcards, POST, PUT, DELETE
frontend_requirements: 1. Card display: large question text centered
2. Click card or 'Show Answer' button to flip and reveal answer
3. 'Next Card' button to load random card
4. Add flashcard form with question, answer, category
